title: Hand made type makes me warm and fuzzy- via Daily Design
content:
[
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130703211319im_/http:/typophile.com/files/raking-leaves_4663.jpg)
](http://web.archive.org/web/20130703211319/http:/www.create-berlin.de/)

Hey, Paper and Type. Let's change this relationship up a bit. Instead of Type always being on Paper, why doesn't Paper make Type?  
Hhhhhmmmm???
author: dragoncaller

comments.content: Sure do!! I posted some of her stuff earlier in my blog. I hadn't seen a couple of those pieces, though. Thanks! ^\_^
